title: Black Alistar petition
body: Id like to start a petition into gaining my black skin, It would be oh so swell dont you think?

replies.body: Sorry, but as much as I'd love to have this skin, if they brought it back it would completely ruin the rarity of the skin, which I'm sure all the players who currently own, would really dislike.
^^ Just like King Rammus, UFO corki, Silver Kayle etc...
